titles.title: Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” / Homily by Zena Gäbrǝʾel on Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus / Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus” (fols. 3ra-64rb) II) Homily by Zena Gäbrǝʾel on Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus; 4 miracles in vita (fols. 64rb-95ra) III) Täʾamrä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus “Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”: 13 miracles (fols. 95rb-119rb)
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: The scribe’s name, Gäbrä Mikaʾel, is written in the supplication formulas on fols. 63vb, 95ra, 118vb. The same scribe wrote Ms. MKL-012.

donors.donor: Wäldä Libanos and his wife Fre Maryam are mentioned in Additio 1 as the commissioners of the Ms. for their children Ḫaylä Śǝllase, ʾAmätä Śǝllase, Wälättä Śǝllase and Wälättä Ṣǝyon as well as for fathers Zä-Wäldä Maryam and Mäzgäbä Śǝllase. Their names are written in the supplication formulas: Wäldä Libanos (e.g., fols. 3ra, 21va, 27rb, 55va, 63vb, 88rb, 103vb), Fre Maryam (e.g., fols. 21vb, 27rb, 55va, 63vb, 88rb 103vb), Ḫaylä Śǝllase (e.g., fols. 27rb, 63vb, 88rb, 103vb), ʾAmätä Śǝllase (e.g., fols. 63vb, 88rb, Wälättä Śǝllase (e.g., fol. 103vb), Wälättä Ṣǝyon (e.g., fol. 95ra), Zä-Wäldä Maryam and Mäzgäbä Śǝllase (e.g., fol. 81vb).

txstates.txstate: The endbands are damaged. Holes are amended on fol. 1.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark brown tooled leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the brown leather cover (at least 5 tools are used: double circle, double line fillet, x-form, interlaced line fillet, cross hatching)

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – III(10/fols. 19r-28v) – IV(10/fols. 29r-38v) – V(10/fols. 39r-48v) – VI(10/fols. 49r-58v) – VII(10/fols. 59r-68v) – VIII(10/fols. 69r-78v) – IX(10/fols. 79r-88v) – X(10/fols. 89r-98v) – XI(10/fols. 99r-108v) – XII(11; s.l. 9, stub after 2/fols. 109r-119v) – B(2/fols. 120r-121v).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; names of the commissioners and the scribe; groups of lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of Text I; incipits of Texts II-III; incipits of sections/miracles; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

additional.cont: Fol. 119ra: Note on commissioning of the writing.
additional.det: The note is written in the main hand. Wäldä Libanos and his wife Fre Maryam are mentioned as the commissioners of the Ms. for their children Ḫaylä Śǝllase, ʾAmätä Śǝllase, Wälättä Śǝllase, Wälättä Ṣǝyon and for fathers Zä-Wäldä Maryam and Mäzgäbä Śǝllase (s. also Varia, below).

extras.extra: - Tämälläs-sign in the shape of ┴ indicating the place where the omission, written in the upper margin in the main hand, belongs: fol. 105vb l.8. - Three names, Wäldä Yoḥannǝs, Täklä Haymanot and Gäbrä Maryam, are crudely written under Additio 1, in the same hand as the monthly readings. - Minor notes, writing exercises, doodles: fols. 1r, 2r, 121r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Monthly readings of Text I are indicated by the names of the months written in the upper margin, in the main hand: ዘሚያዝያ: fol. 3ra ዘግንቦት: fol. 10rb ዘሰኔ: fol. 16ra ዘሐምሌ: fol. 21vb ዘነሐሴ: fol. 27va ዘመስከረም: fol. 35ra ዘጥቅምት: fol. 46va ዘኅዳር: fol. 55va ዘታሕሣሥ: fol. 64rb ዘጥር: fol. 71rb ዘየካቲት: fol. 81vb ዘመጋቢት: fol. 88rb. - Monthly readings of Text II are indicated by the names of the months crudely written in the upper margin, in the same hand as that which wrote three names below Additio 1: ዘሚያዝያ: fol. 95rb ዘግንቦት: fol. 97r ዘሰኔ: fol. 98vb ዘሐምሌ: fol. 99vb ዘነሐሴ: fol. 101va ዘመስከረም: fol. 103vb ዘጥቅምት: fol. 104vb ዘኅዳር: fol. 106va ዘታሕሣሥ: fol. 107ra ዘጥር: fol. 109vb ዘየካቲት: fol. 112rb ዘመጋቢት: fol. 114vb.

miniature.info: Fol. 119v: Virgin Mary with her Child, Archangels Michael and Gabriel.
miniature.details: Legend: ቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልዳ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ገብርኤል “Saint Michael with Her beloved Son, Saint Gabriel”.

miniature.info: Fol. 120r: St. Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus with lions and leopards.
miniature.details: Legend: አቡነ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ምስለ፡ አናብስት፡ ወአናምርት[sic] “ʾAbunä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus with lions and leopards”.

frames.frame: Fol. 3r (incipit of Text I): coloured (red, yellow) ornamental band; geometric and floral motifs.
